ChangeList.Description: Introduced the taxonomy API, including the [termStore.store](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-store?view=graph-rest-beta), [termStore.term](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-term?view=graph-rest-beta), [termStore.set](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-set?view=graph-rest-beta), and [termStore.relation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/termstore-relation?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.

Added the [geolocationColumn](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/geolocationcolumn?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. The **geolocationColumn** resource applies to the [columnDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/columnDefinition?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the **followedSites** navigation property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to [list the sites followed by the signed-in user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/sites-list-followed?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: user,list the sites followed by the signed-in user

ChangeList.Description: Added the **followedSites** navigation property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity to [list the sites followed by the signed-in user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/sites-list-followed?view=graph-rest-1.0).
ChangeList.Target: user,list the sites followed by the signed-in user

ChangeList.Description: Added the **dataLocatonCode** property on the [siteCollection](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sitecollection?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **tenantId** property on the [sharepointIds](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sharepointids?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [followSite](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-follow?view=graph-rest-1.0) navigation property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added the [unfollowSite](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-unfollow?view=graph-rest-1.0) navigation property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **subscriptions** navigation property to the [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/list?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **subscriptions** navigation property to the [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/list?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [followSite](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/follow-site?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity set

Added the [unfollowSite](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unfollow-site?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity set
Added the **analytics** property to the [driveItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/driveitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **analytics** property to the [site](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **analytics** property to the [listItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **getActivitiesByInterval** function on the [driveItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/driveitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **getActivitiesByInterval** function on the [site](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **getActivitiesByInterval** function on the [listItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [itemAnalytics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemanalytics?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [itemActivityStat](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactivity?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [itemActionStat](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactionstat?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the [accessAction](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessaction?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the [incompleteData](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incompletedata?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the **access** property to the [itemActivity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactivity?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the **location** property to the [itemActivity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactivity?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
The format of the identifier for the **site** resource has changed. This is a breaking change in the beta API.
The sites resource is now avaialble in the v1.0 endpoint.,  Added the **site** and **siteCollection** resource types.

Removed the **sharepoint** navigation properties. Sites are now accessed directly through the **sites** navigation property. ,  Removed the **fieldDefinition** resource. It has been replaced by **columnDefinition**. ,  Removed the **siteCollectionId** and **siteId** properties from **site**. Use **sharepointIds** instead. ,  Removed the **listItemId** property from **listItem**. Use **sharepointIds** instead. ,  Renamed the **columnSet** property on **listItem** to **fields**. ,  Changed **site** resources to use the SharePoint hostname as part of their ID.

Added the **booleanColumn**, **calculatedColumn**, **choiceColumn**, **dateTimeColumn**, **lookupColumn**, **numberColumn**, **personOrGroupColumn**, and **textColumn** resource types. ,  Added the **displayName** property to **site**. ,  Added the **columns** navigation property to **site**. ,  Added the **list** and **listItem** navigation properties to **sharedDriveItem**. ,  Added the **sharepointIds** property to **list** and **listItem**, and **site**. ,  Added the **columnDefinition** resource type.

Access to SharePoint sites and [lists by ID](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/list-get?view=graph-rest-beta) or [path/URL](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/baseitem-getbyurl?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: listing, creating, getting, and deleting instances of listItem
ChangeList.Description: Support for [listing, creating, getting, and deleting instances of listItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: listing, creating, getting, and deleting instances of listItem
